item.title: The #OpenStreetMap Foundation Board #OSMF launched the 2021 #OSM Survey to know what the community thinks about what the Foundation did last year and what do you think the Foundation should focus on for this year and in the future: https://lists.openstreetmap.org/pipermail/talk/2021-January/085953.html. Make yourself heard.
Are you looking forward to next #OpenStreetMap State of the Map #SotM ? #OSMF is calling for help to organize it: https://lists.openstreetmap.org/pipermail/talk/2021-January/085938.html.

#FOSDEM 2021 (online event this year) is approaching (Sat-Sun, Feb 6-7) and has, among a much broader agenda, talks on geo-related data, free and open source geospatial software and its ecosystem. Check the talk abstracts at https://fosdem.org/2021/schedule/track/geospatial/. #GIS #OpenStreetMap
Let's meet Jorisbo, Mapper of the Month #MotM from OpenStreetMap Belgium: https://openstreetmap.be/en/motm/2021/01/11/jorisbo.html

9 #Decentralized, #P2P and Open Source alternatives to mainstream social media platforms like #Twitter, #Facebook, #YouTube and #Reddit: #Minds, #Aether, #Mastodon, #Lbry, #KArma, #Peertube, #Diaspora, #Dtube, and #Signal. Also cited: #MeWe #Voice. https://itsfoss.com/mainstream-social-media-alternaives/ #itsfoss

Call for volunteers. The #OpenStreetMap Foundation Board of Directors #OSMF wishes to proceed with creation of a Software Dispute Resolution Panel made up of volunteer Foundation members who will resolve software disputes around OpenStreetMap-focused software. https://lists.openstreetmap.org/pipermail/osmf-talk/2021-January/007639.html

Do you play #MapRoulette? https://maproulette.org/ MapRoulette has dozens of mapping Challenges that are created by experienced mappers. Each Challenge is about improving #OpenStreetMap in one very specific way. Do you want to add pedestrian crossings? Fix bridges? Add opening times for shops? There‚Äôs a challenge for it.

#Amazon launches Amazon Location Service, powered by #Esri, #HERE, and #OpenStreetMap: https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/aws/amazon-location-add-maps-and-location-awareness-to-your-applications/. It‚Äôs ‚Äúin preview‚Äù and ‚Äúpriced at a fraction of common alternatives‚Äù.

With #MapComplete, you can create your own contribution theme to easily add data to #OpenStreetMap. It‚Äôs a crossover of #StreetComplete and #MapContrib: as easy to use as StreetComplete, but focused on a single subject (e.g. nature, bicycle infrastructure, ...). - Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nVbFrNVPxPw - Project: https://github.com/pietervdvn/MapComplete - Wiki: https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/MapComplete

Do you know all street names in your area like the back of your hand ? Test your knowledge with the aptly-named game ‚ÄúBack of your Hand‚Äù: https://backofyourhand.com. It‚Äôs powered by #OpenStreetMap data, so you can use it as a quality-assurance tool.

Mapping public transport features in #OpenStreetMap is admittedly a complex subject. Here is #OsmAnd‚Äôs ‚ÄúGuidelines on how to build or correct public transport routes‚Äù: https://osmand.net/blog/guideline-pt
This OpenStreetMap US Virtual Mappy Hour features an overview of #Overpass Turbo and accessing #OpenStreetMap data: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UvtvHl4Btsk

#GitHub will no longer present a cookie notification banner, because it's scrapping non-essential cookies: https://go.theregister.com/feed/www.theregister.com/2020/12/17/github_will_no_longer_present/ #cookies #privacy
The last issue of the #OpenStreetMap Mapper of the Month #MotM of this calendar year is available and features @vucod: https://openstreetmap.be/en/motm/2020/12/15/vucod.html.
Another month, another Mapper of the Month. Let's meet Diseret this time: https://openstreetmap.be/en/motm/2020/11/15/diseret.html #OpenStreetMap #Belgium #MotM
#OpenStreetCam becomes #KartaView, following the OSM Foundation‚Äôs discouraging of names like OpenStreetSomething: https://blog.improveosm.org/en/2020/11/hello-kartaview/ #OpenStreetMap
A 12-minute video tutorial to install #Wireguard and #NextCloud on a #Raspberry Pi with #Docker and #IOTstack: https://invidious.site/watch?v=7Pe-Cv0tnLs

Nice idea. #Plogging is a combination of jogging with picking up litter (Swedish verb plocka upp (pick up) + jogga (jog)). And there is even an app for that. #WePlog https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.nebulae.weplog&hl=en&gl=US Powered by #OpenStreetMap as base map. It‚Äôs not without reminding #OpenLitterMap https://openlittermap.com, but this one is more about observation, whereas plogging is really taking action.
OSM In Realtime is a visualization of the changes made to #OpenStreetMap in near real-time. Great way to realize how lively the OSM community is. https://jwestman.gitlab.io/osm-in-realtime/

OSM Apps is a searchable web catalog of all apps and services identified in the #OpenStreetMap wiki: https://osm-apps.zottelig.ch. I knew there were many, but I never thought that many... üòÄ #OSMApps
